thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Soccer Coach - Sports and Fitness

title: Soccer Coach - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: We are looking for current and former college athletes interested in joining our staff as part-time coaches   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
